items.desc:
The holder gains the Sorcerer trait.
The holder gains @APIncrease*100@% more Ability Power from all sources.

items.desc:
The holder gains the Bastion trait.
Gain @ResistConversionToADRatio*100@% of Armor as Attack Damage.
Gain @ResistConversionToAPRatio*100@% of Magic Resistance as Ability Power.

items.desc:
The holder gains the Prodigy trait.
On cast, shield the lowest percent Health ally for @ManaConversion*100@% of mana spent.

items.desc: The holder gains the Battle Academia trait, and @HealthPerPotential@ Health and @DAPerPotential*100@% Damage Amp per %i:set14AmpIcon%.

items.desc: The holder gains the Heavyweight trait, and gains @HealthPerTakedown@ max Health on takedown.

items.desc:
The holder gains the Juggernaut trait.
While above @HealthBreakpoint*100@% Health, gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed.

items.desc:
The holder gains the Protector trait.
When a shield on the holder breaks, heal the holder and the nearest ally for @HealPercent@% of the shield's initial value.
items.name: Protector Emblem

items.desc: The holder gains the Crystal Gambit trait.
items.name: Crystal Gambit Emblem

items.desc:
The holder gains the Duelist trait.

Attacks deal @BaseTrueDamage@ bonus true damage, plus @BonusTrueDamage@ bonus true damage for each time the target was damaged by this effect.
items.name: Duelist Emblem

items.desc:
The holder gains the Executioner trait.
Attacks and Abilities that critically strike deal @BleedDamage*100@% bonus true damage over @BleedDuration@ seconds.

items.desc: The holder gains the Soul Fighter trait.

items.desc: The holder gains the Supreme Cells trait.

items.desc: The holder gains the Wraith trait.
items.name: Wraith Emblem

items.desc:

Front 2 rows: @ResistBuff@ Armor and Magic Resist
Back 2 rows: @ASBuff*100@% Attack Speed

items.desc: The holder gains the Sniper trait and @Range@ range.
items.name: Sniper Emblem

items.desc: The holder gains the Luchador trait.

items.desc:

items.desc: Gain <TFTRadiantItemBonus>@AttackSpeedPerStack@%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> stacking Attack Speed every second.

items.desc:

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Banshee's Veil

items.desc:
Passive: On attack, deal @ModifiedPassiveCloneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to a nearby enemy.

Active: Strike swiftly, sending @ModifiedNumClones@ (%i:scaleAS%) afterimages to the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies. Each deals @ModifiedCloneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduces armor by @ModifiedArmorShred@ (%i:scaleAP%).
items.name: Duelist Stance

items.desc: Briefly gain <scaleLevel>@WindowedDR*100@%</scaleLevel> Durability, then deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedInitialDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target,  <physicalDamage>@ModifiedFinalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to all enemies behind the target, and <physicalDamage>@ModifiedAllEnemiesDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to other enemies in a 2-hex radius.
items.name: Juggernaut Stance

items.desc:
Deal @ModifiedStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to the lowest Health enemy within @HexRange@ hexes and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds. Other enemies in a 1-hex radius take @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

After @NumKills@ kills with this ability all enemies instantly take @ModifiedShockwaveDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and are Stunned for @KillStunDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Executioner Stance

items.desc:
Mighty Mech champions heal The Mighty Mech for @TFTUnitProperty.Item:TFT15_SentaiRanger_GalioHealRatio@% of the damage they deal.

By our powers combined!

Bring down the blade of justice!

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleAS% @AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Zeke's Herald

items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_BindOnEquipTRA@
items.name: Thief's Gloves

items.desc: Gain @AttackSpeedPerStack@% stacking Attack Speed every second.
items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade

items.desc:
@MRShred@% Shred enemies within @HexRange@ hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to @ManaRatio@% of the Mana spent.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
items.name: Ionic Spark

items.desc: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain a Shield equal to @PercentHealthShield*100@% of the wearer's maximum Health that rapidly decays over @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Sterak's Gage

items.desc:
Gain @PercentMaxHP*100@% max health.

Every @HealthRegenInterval@ seconds, heal @PercentHealthDamage@% max Health.
items.name: Dragon's Claw

items.desc: Cause this unit to deal @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@% damage on their next attack.
items.name: Ace

items.desc:
The holder's first attack after each Ability cast deals @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_Artifact_LichBane_Damage@ bonus magic damage.

Damage increases based on Stage.
items.name: Lich Bane

items.desc: Critical Strikes grant @BuffDamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp for @Duration@ seconds, stacking up to @MaxStacks@ times.
items.name: Striker's Flail

items.desc: <tftrules> This transforms into a random item at the start of combat!</tftrules>
Every 3 seconds, summon a powerful Sentinel equipped with Completed, Artifact, and Radiant items.
items.name: Sentinel Swarm

items.desc: Shields have @PercentShieldConversion@% of their value converted to max Health instead.
items.name: Forbidden Idol

items.desc: Grant a @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@ health shield.
items.name: Pengu's Protection

items.desc: Deal @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@ damage.
items.name: Portable Pain

items.desc: Consume @HealthToFeed@ player health for Health %i:scaleHealth%, Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% and Ability Power %i:scaleAP%.
items.name: A Hungry Snack

items.desc: Stun for @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@ seconds.
items.name: Hammer to the Face

items.desc: The holder's attacks target random enemies.
items.name: Fishbones

items.desc: Gain @ArmorPerEnemy@ Armor and @MRPerEnemy@ Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.
items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate

items.desc: Attacks deal @PercentMaxHealthSplash@% of the holder's max Health plus @PercentAttackDamageSplash@% of their Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies.
items.name: Titanic Hydra

items.desc:
Gain @PercentMaxHP*100@% max health.

Take @AutoDamageReduction*100@% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal @1StarAoEDamage@ magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: @ICD@ seconds
items.name: Bramble Vest

items.desc: Error 404: Debug command not found.
items.name: MissingNo

items.desc: %i:scaleArmor% +@Armor@ Armor
items.name: Chain Vest

items.desc: Whenever a Shield on the holder breaks, @PercentDamage@% of that Shield's initial value is dealt to the nearest enemy as magic damage.
items.name: Unending Despair

items.desc:
Enemies who damage the holder are @AttackSpeedSlowPercent@% Chilled for @SlowDuration@ seconds. After @NumApplications@ Chills from this item, the attacker is Stunned instead (Cooldown: @FreezeCooldown@ seconds).

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Chill: reduce Attack Speed
Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities
items.name: Eternal Winter

items.desc: %i:scaleAS% +@AS@% Attack Speed
items.name: Recurve Bow

items.desc: Gain @DamageAmp*100@% additional Damage Amp against Tanks.
items.name: Giant Slayer

items.desc:
Damage dealt @Shred@% Shreds and @Shred@% Sunders enemies for @Duration@ seconds.

Your team gains @TeamAD*100@% Attack Damage and @TeamAP@ Ability Power.

​​[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
items.name: Obsidian Cleaver

items.desc:
Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% max Health.

Every @ICD@ seconds, deal @BurnPercent@% Burn and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wound to an enemy within @HexRange@ hexes for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the targets max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received
items.name: Sunfire Cape

items.desc:
Every @HealTickRate@ seconds, heal your team for @MaxHealthHeal@% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to @TOOLTIPEmpoweredHeal@% max Health for @NumBonusHeals@ extra heals.

Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@

​​[Support item]
items.name: Virtue of the Martyr

items.desc:
Gain 2 effects:
  • @AD_NotStatBar*100@% Attack Damage and @AP_NotStatBar@% Ability Power.
  • @StatOmnivamp_NotStatBar*100@% Omnivamp.

    While above @HealthThreshold*100@% health, double the Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health, double the Omnivamp.
items.name: Hand Of Justice

items.desc: At @HealthThreshold@% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects.
items.name: Edge of Night

items.desc: %i:TFTManaRegen% +@ManaRegen@ Mana Regen
items.name: Tear of the Goddess

items.desc:
Once per combat at @PercentHealthThreshold@% Health, become invulnerable and untargetable for @InvulnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Zhonya's Paradox

items.desc: %i:scaleMR% +@MagicResist@ Magic Resist
items.name: Negatron Cloak

items.desc:
Gain @StackingAD*100@% Attack Damage and @StackingSP@% Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to @StackCap@ times.

At full stacks, gain @StackedAmp*100@% Damage Amp and gain immunity to crowd control.
items.name: Titan's Resolve

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant @AllyHealth@ Health and @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Knight's Vow

items.desc: @PercentOfOverkill@% of overkill damage plus @BaseDamage@ is dealt as magic damage to the three enemies nearest the target.
items.name: Luden's Tempest

items.desc: Combat start: Teleport the holder to the mirrored hex on the enemy's side of the board. After @Duration@ seconds, the holder returns to their original location.
items.name: Spectral Cutlass

items.desc: Attacks grant @ADOnAttack*100@% stacking Attack Damage, up to @MaxStacks@ attacks. After @MaxStacks@ attacks, gain @ASCapstone*100@% Attack Speed.
items.name: Kraken's Fury

items.desc: Cause this unit to deal  @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@% increased damage. Does not stack. Lasts until the unit is deconstructed.
items.name: Damage Amp

items.desc: Your team gains @Health@ health. Whenever a unit dies, a crystalline copy one star level lower joins the fight!
items.name: Crystalline Reinforcements

items.desc: +@CritChance@ Critical Strike Chance
items.name: Sparring Gloves

items.desc: Gain +1 Attack Range, increased by 1 whenever the holder kills an enemy.
items.name: Rapid Firecannon

items.desc: Use on a champion to unequip all items as many times as you want. Converts all future Magnetic Removers to Reforgers.
items.name: Golden Item Remover

items.desc: Once per combat at @HealthThreshold@% Health, gain a @ShieldHealthPercent@% max Health Shield that lasts up to @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Bloodthirster

items.desc: Every 3rd attack deals @Damage@ + @APScalar*100@% of the holder's Ability Power as additional magic damage to 4 enemies.
items.name: Statikk Shiv

items.desc: Gain %i:scaleRange% @HexRangeIncrease@ Attack Range. Gain @DamageAmpPerHex*100@% Damage Amp against a target for each hex between the holder and the target.
items.name: Sniper's Focus

items.desc:
When the holder dies, the @ItemsGranted@ highest percent health allies gain a temporary completed item.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Unstable Treasure Chest

items.desc: Combat start: Gain @APPerInterval@% Ability Power every @IntervalSeconds@ seconds in combat.
items.name: Archangel's Staff

items.desc: Taunt all enemies who are in range to attack the target.
items.name: Taunt

items.desc: Reduce the holder's max Mana by @FlatManaReduction@. Subsequent spellcasts reduce max Mana by @ReductionPerCast*100@%, to a minimum of @MinimumTotalMana@.
items.name: Dawncore

items.desc: Grant @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@ Mana.
items.name: The Tears of My Enemies

items.desc:
Combat start: Taunt.
On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. The Voidspawn has massively reduced effectiveness when created by a summoned unit.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter
items.name: Zz'Rot Portal

items.desc:
If the holder is a Tank, regenerate @HealingPercentPerTickPerStage@-@HealingPercentPerTickPerStage*7@% maximum Health every @HealTickRate@ seconds (based on stage). Otherwise, gain @ADandAPPerTick@% %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power every @HealTickRate@ seconds instead.

If the holder of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.

You can remove this item by benching the holder.
items.name: Crown of Demacia

items.desc:
While the holder is alive, all enemies are @TOOLTIPWoundAmount@% Wounded and all allies gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp. This effect refreshes every @WoundDuration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
Wound: Reduces healing received
items.name: The Eternal Flame

items.desc:
Every @TriggerRate@ seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for @PercentOfResists@% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

On death grants this shield to all allies.
items.name: Lightshield Crest

items.desc:
@IgnorePainPercent@% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over @BleedDuration@ seconds as non-lethal damage.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Death's Defiance

items.desc: Attacks grant @FlatManaRestore@ bonus Mana.

items.desc:

Chill: reduce Attack Speed

Gain an additional @ManaPercIncrease*100@% Mana from all sources. The wearer gains an additional bonus based on their Role:

Tanks and Fighters: Gain @FrontlineResists@ Armor and Magic Resistance.

Other Roles: Gain @BacklineADAP@% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

items.name: Deathfire Grasp

items.desc: Attacks grant @ASPerStack*100@% stacking Attack Speed. Every @StacksPerBonus@ attacks also grant @ADPerBonus*100@% Attack Damage and @APPerBonus@% Ability Power.
items.name: Flickerblades

items.desc: Gain @ModifiedADAP*100@% additional Attack Damage and Ability Power from all sources.
items.name: Blue Buff

Attacks deal an additional @PercentDamage@% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage and heal the holder for the damage dealt.

The holder cannot cast their Ability or gain Mana.
items.name: Corrupt Vampiric Scepter

items.desc:
Damage from attacks and Abilities @ArmorReductionPercent@% Sunder the target for @ArmorBreakDuration@ seconds. This effect does not stack.

Abilities can critically strike.

Every @ShieldRate@ seconds, grant a @BaseShieldAmount@-@MaxShield@ Shield (based on Stage) to the @ShieldTargets@ lowest percent health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

Heals the holder for @PercentHealing@% of all magic damage dealt.

Damage increases based on Stage.
items.name: Wit's End

items.desc: %i:scaleAP% +@AP@ Ability Power
items.name: Needlessly Large Rod

items.desc: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing @PercentHealthDamage@% of their max Health as magic damage.
items.name: Horizon Focus

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleArmor% @BonusDefense@ Armor and %i:scaleMR% @BonusDefense@ Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Randuin's Omen

items.desc: Gain @BaseDurability*100@% Durability. While above @ThresholdForEmpower*100@% Health, instead gain @EmpoweredDurability*100@% Durability.
items.name: Steadfast Heart

items.desc: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within @HexRange@ hexes. The next 2 critical attacks deal @CritDamageBonusPercent@% bonus Critical Strike Damage.
items.name: Prowler's Claw

items.desc:
Every @ShieldRate@ seconds, grant a @BaseShieldAmount@-@MaxShield@ Shield (based on Stage) to the @ShieldTargets@ lowest percent health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Moonstone Renewer

items.desc: <tftitemrules>...why else would it be here?</tftitemrules>
items.name: Frying Pan

items.desc:
Your team gains +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ max team size.

@PercentGoldChance@% chance to drop 1 gold when you win combat.

"...the Heart of a hero..."
items.name: Tactician's Crown

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant @ASBuff@% Attack Speed and @BonusResists@ Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies in the same row, and all allies behind them for @BuffDuration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Aegis of the Legion

items.desc:
Combat Start: Gain immunity to crowd control for @SpellShieldDuration@ seconds.

Gain @ProcAttackSpeed*100@% stacking Attack Speed every second.
items.name: Quicksilver

items.desc:
Perfect peace and calm for the holder - and all who face it.

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_Augment_TragicalBlade_TRAKey@
items.name: Deathblade

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant @ChaliceAP@ Ability Power and @BonusInitialMana@ Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Chalice of Power

items.desc:
Grants immunity to Stuns and the holder's attacks Stun the target for @StunDuration@ seconds.

The holder's Attack Speed is locked at @AttackSpeedCap@.
items.name: Silvermere Dawn

items.desc:
Your team gains +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ max team size.

@PercentGoldChance@% chance to drop 1 gold when the holder dies.

"Imbued with a Philosopher's wisdom..."
items.name: Tactician's Shield

items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_BindOnEquipTRA@
items.name: Accomplice's Gloves

items.desc: Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% max health.
items.name: Warmog's Armor

items.desc: Takedowns increase the holder's Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power by @StatsPerTakedown@, increased to @StatsPerKill@ if they score the kill.
items.name: Seeker's Armguard

items.desc:
Damage from attacks and Abilities @MRShred@% Shred the target for @MRShredDuration@ seconds. This effect does not stack.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
items.name: Void Staff

items.desc:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below @ExecutePercent@% of their maximum Health. Executions have a @GoldChance@% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

Gold Collected: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@g
[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Gold Collector

items.desc: This slot can't hold an item.
items.name: Unusable Slot

items.desc:
Heal the lowest percent Health ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt.

Ally Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@
